definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty

pinyin: guo2 nei4 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2
guo2 min2 sheng1 chan3 zong3 zhi2

sentences.english: Too much of the nation's G. D. P. is siphoned into a few hands.
sentences.chinese: 國家大部分的國內生產總值集中流入一部分人手中。

sentences.english: Its per capita GDP remains one of the lowest in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 它的人均國內生產總值爲歐洲最低的之一。

sentences.english: GDP has lurched sickeningly downward, but employment has not.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值急劇下滑，但就業率還算大致穩定。

sentences.english: GDP growth rate is calculated at comparable prices.
sentences.chinese: 國內生產總值增長速度按可比價格計算。

sentences.english: This function will look at the cards in the hand and return the total value of the hand.
sentences.chinese: 該函數將查看手中的牌並返回手上的牌面總值。

sentences.english: It had a private savings rate of 15pc of GDP.
sentences.chinese: 它的私人儲蓄率佔到國內生產總值的15%。

sentences.english: The per capita GDP in Kenya is just $783 a year.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亞的年人均國內生產總值只有783美元。

sentences.english: An index in which greater weight is given to shares that have a larger market capitalization.
sentences.chinese: 指市場總值較高的股票佔較大權重的指數。

sentences.english: Altogether, the losses amounted to 200 percent of Grenada’s gross domestic product.
sentences.chinese: 全部損失高達格林納達國內生產總值的200%。

sentences.english: If the defect rate is 1%, then the penalty rate will be 1% of the contract value.
sentences.chinese: 假如次品率是1%，那麼賠償率爲合同總值的1%。

sentences.english: In many countries, the data have been aggregated.
sentences.chinese: 很多國家的數據都取了總值。

sentences.english: In 2010, Ningxia’s GDP totaled 164.3 billion yuan.
The president said that the gross national product had declined by a big margin.
sentences.chinese: 總統說國民生產總值已大幅度下降。

sentences.english: Conclusion The nurse-in-chief duty plays a positive role in nursing management.
sentences.chinese: 結論護理總值班在護理管理中發揮了積極的作用。

sentences.english: Annual government deficit must not beat 3 per cent of GDP.
sentences.chinese: 每年政府的財政赤字必需低於海內出產總值的3%。

sentences.english: Defense totals are now shown in your inventory.
sentences.chinese: 防禦力總值現在會顯示在你的道具欄裏。

definition: to add up the total/to figure what sth amounts to/to consider
Gundam, Japanese animation franchise/Jean-Luc Godard (1930-), French-Swiss film director
up to/no less than/as much as
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
